channel.title: Nexon-World 639 : Client won't work!
channel.description:
Ok so I've been searching for a solution to make my client work but can't find any. You guys are my last hope :D
This is the situation :
I've downloaded the 639 Nexon-World base (https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,563888.0.html , downloads down but you can find them if you search) and I've managed all the basic stuff like starting the server , getting myself on it , making me owner , ... The tricky thing is , making a client so other players can play aswell (right now just for friends). I made a no-ip domain and changed every server_ip or any other part where it said 127.0.01 or nexon.no-ip.org to that domain.
So I went looking on the net and found different tutorials , some of them said I had to remove all java and bat files , which I did. some of them said I had to Sign the Jar , which I did. Some of them said both. I tried them all , first I had some problems with the manifest part because I didn't realize the name would be "Runclient" instead of "client" but got that fixed now.
If I start to run the client.jar on my pc , the client starts but it gets stuck at "Checking for updates - 1%".
[img]http://i.imgur.com/D5lM7um.png[/img]
I thought it might be because I was running the server on the same pc so I sent the jarfile to a friend , he tried to open it and got "could not find mainclass" (I don't have that problem). I've tried adding a manifest.mf myself and when I ran it as a batfile I got this :
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KwXyV44.png[/img]
And yes , I opened my port 43594.
So now my question to you guys is : What the hell should I do ?
Thanks , Mr Empty
EDIT : If needed I can post a link to download the jar file , so someone can test and see what's wrong. EDIT2 : Just ask me if you need more information ! :)

item.title: Nexon-World 639 : Client won't work!
item.dc:creator: @twobrosplay twobrosplay
item.description:
@twobrosplay wrote:

I’m also working on the nexon-world files (currently trying to get summoning but can’t find and propper tutorials) - do you have summoning?

Note: did you change the ip’s on the ~runlocalhost.bat or 1. Player Nexon-world.bat?

Try your ip in there and (connect with your friends using hamachi or somthing?)

-Logan

Read full topic

item.title: Nexon-World 639 : Client won't work!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Empty Mr Empty
item.description:
@Mr_Empty wrote:

Ok so I’ve been searching for a solution to make my client work but can’t find any.
You guys are my last hope

This is the situation :

I’ve downloaded the 639 Nexon-World base (https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,563888.0.html , downloads down but you can find them if you search) and I’ve managed all the basic stuff like starting the server , getting myself on it , making me owner , …
The tricky thing is , making a client so other players can play aswell (right now just for friends).
I made a no-ip domain and changed every server_ip or any other part where it said 127.0.01 or nexon.no-ip.org to that domain.

So I went looking on the net and found different tutorials , some of them said I had to remove all java and bat files , which I did. some of them said I had to Sign the Jar , which I did. Some of them said both. I tried them all , first I had some problems with the manifest part because I didn’t realize the name would be “Runclient” instead of “client” but got that fixed now.

If I start to run the client.jar on my pc , the client starts but it gets stuck at “Checking for updates - 1%”.

I thought it might be because I was running the server on the same pc so I sent the jarfile to a friend , he tried to open it and got “could not find mainclass” (I don’t have that problem).
I’ve tried adding a manifest.mf myself and when I ran it as a batfile I got this :

And yes , I opened my port 43594.

So now my question to you guys is : What the hell should I do ?

Thanks ,
Mr Empty

EDIT : If needed I can post a link to download the jar file , so someone can test and see what’s wrong.
EDIT2 : Just ask me if you need more information !
